From the brand

Vtopmart is dedicated to creating a better home life for every family.

Our Vision:

To pursue a better life and enjoy it, we are committed to providing various well-designed, high-quality, practically household products with fashionable concepts and innovative design to make your home full of warmth and love.

Vtopmart Drawer Organizer

Explore More Categories

Fit Multi Occasions

Make Everything Organized —- These clear versatile drawer dividers trays are perfect for any place in your home. Fit all kinds of drawers, such as vanity / bathroom / kitchen / office drawers, ideal for organizing cosmetics, makeup tools, hair accessories, jewelry, office supplies, craft supplies, utensils, etc.
Combination of 4 Different Sizes —- One set includes 25pcs storage bins in 4 different sizes, which makes you can customize combinations to store items and organize drawer for your specific needs. Includes: 9 x 6 x 2 inches (3pcs), 9 x 3x 2 inches(6pcs), 6 x 3 x 2 inches(8pcs), 3 x 3 x 2 inches(8cps).
Non-Slip and Durable —- Extra 200pcs silicone pads are included, just stick them on the bottom of the plastic trays for non-slip. Made of durable and clear plastic, so you can see what’s in it without digging around or making a mess, help you get a neat lifestyle.
Stackable Design —- Organize all your items and then stack these bins into one other, that will save much space especially when you have a narrow drawer. Use these trays to separate your messy drawer, you will find it’s so easy to keep things neat and tidy.
Easy to Clean —- Our desk drawer storage bins are easy to be wiped clean with a damp cloth and perfect for keeping everything in its place. Convenient for use in your daily life, make everything look beautiful and better organized.

Read more

4 Size Combination

Variety of sizes help make the organization of different items more flexible and easier. Fit all kinds of drawers, such as vanity, bathroom, kitchen and office drawers

Non-Slip Design

Silicone pads at the bottom of the bin prevent the box from moving when dragging the drawer, always keep things in their own place.

Built to Last

Made of durable and transparent plastic, built to last. Clear bins make you can see everything in them when pulling a stack of them out of a drawer.

Package Include:

  • 9 x 6 x 2 inches (3pcs)
  • 9 x 3x 2 inches (6pcs)
  • 6 x 3 x 2 inches (8pcs)
  • 3 x 3 x 2 inches (8cps)

Read more

Multi Purpose

Organize Makeup

Fit perfectly for your vanity drawer, for organizing cosmetics, makeup tools, hair accessories, nail polish, and more.

Organize Office Supplies

Convenient for storing small items such as pencils, stationery and so on, helping you to save space. Make your desk look more neatly and cleanly.

Organize Kitchen Utensils

Ideal for organizing forks, spoons, steak knives in your kitchen, allow you to keep everything handy for meal prep and cooking.

Read more

From the brand

King&Charles Cabinet Jig

12 years of research on cabinet hardware tools, there is always one for you here

ABS/ Metal/ Aluminum/ Template

【Robust Build Lightweight】- Unparalleled high-definition tick marks and the ruler is made from stainless steel. Ensure the jig’s premium durability, high corrosion resistance, high strength.
【Different from Other】- Considering that drilling directly with an electric drill will cause the jig to shake, we gift an “Automatic Center Hole Punch”. When you find the location, you just need to use the “hole punch” to directly punch the small holes, and then use the electric drill to punch the big holes on have already been punched small holes. It is a more ingenious way.
【Time Saver Quick Drilling】- Cabinet hardware template tool a full day of measuring and re-measuring. Set it up once and use it repeatedly with no further measurements, A good accessory, and helper for woodwork or DIY.
【Detachable & Portable】- Cabinet hardware installation template quick-release ” drill guide” sliders can be split into small parts by taking a small Space to easily carry. The storage bag we present will solve all your troubles of carrying.
【Jig Widely Application】- Cabinet hardware jig is ideal for installing kitchen drawers, cabinets, door handles and drawer fronts, Hinge, Or Shelf. Works on any cabinet door stile and rails including shaker doors & recessed drawer fronts.

DIY will be easy !

  • Do you want to be an expert in installing cabinets？

As we know there’s no room for mistakes in the cabinet handle installation projects.

When it comes to installing new cabinet handles for your kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, and office drawers, even the slightest margin of error is not acceptable.

Aside from consuming more time than you allotted, also running the risk of ruining your furniture.

  • A good accessory, how important is it for carpentry or DIY！

You don’t need to be an expert to use it. The jig requires zero experience and won’t require you to use heavy clamps or other complicated mounting instruments.

Cabinet Hardware Jig for Handles and Knobs- Woodworking Cabinet Handle Hole Locator. The fastest and most accurate hardware tool on the market.

that is a nice tool for cabinet makers, construction workers, professionals and home.

Our product advantage – perfect combination

  • Considering that drilling directly with an electric drill will cause the jig to shake, we gift an “Automatic Center Hole Punch”. When you find the location, you just need to use the “hole punch” to directly punch the small holes, and then use the electric drill to punch the big holes on have already been punched small holes. It is a more ingenious way.
Our product features

  • High Corrosion Resistance
  • High Precision
  • Easy to Use
  • Wide Range of Adjustment
  • Can Be Split Into Small Parts
  • Convenient to carry

Package Includes

  • 1x Stainless Steel Ruler
  • 1x Sliding Plate
  • 1x Longitudinal Inch/Metric Sliding Ruler
  • 3x Adjustable Slider
  • 1x Center Hole Punch
  • 1x User Manual
  • 1x Storage Bag
  • 1x Color Box

Read more

Automatic Center Hole Punch

  • Quick and Easy Marking

Center punches are a necessity for accurate drilling applications to mark the point and allow drill bit tips to align to the marked area.

  • Durable Construction

Our center punch is constructed from heavy-duty metal to resist against corrosion and impact giving it extra durability.

  • Comfortable Grip

The ball end allows user to grasp center punch in a comfortable position to make punching much easier and more precise.

How to Use Center Hole Punch

  • Determine Drilling Spot on Material
  • Align Tip of Center Punch to Spot
  • Simply Apply Pressure to Cap to Enable Marking
  • Begin Drilling and Place Drill Bit Tip

Product Description

Beiz Gold Desk Organizer with Sliding Drawer, 1 Tray and 5 Vertical Slot Sorters

Enjoy clean and exquisite life to the fullest with Beiz, we put users at the center of our decisions and design products that address life’s needs and help you make the most of your daily activities

Do you want a multi-function desk organizer that can store, clean and tidy desktop?Do you want your work area to be a pleasant place that reflects your bright and glamorous personality？Do you want to change your desktop from a boring space to a fashionable display area?

Beiz gold desk organizer can give you all you need

Specifications:

Color: Gold

Material: Metal

Dimensions: 12.6″L x 9.1″W x 11.8″H

Compartments : 5 upright sections and 1 tray with a 3 sections drawer

Shipping Weight: 1.1 LBS

Package: 1 x Gold workspace organizer

Beiz Desk Organizer Keeps Your Desk Organized

Creating extra storage space virtually anywhere by allowing you to add storage vertically

Gold-colored office accessories are just the thing to elevate your workspace and give it the feeling of an executive office. At the same time, it also cleans your desktop and improves efficiency

Adding a touch of gold to even mundane objects like your office supplies makes them feel a little more glamorous boosts warmth and elegance. We’re here with the perfect gold office supplies to make your office feel a little more luxurious

Trendy Gold color design Metal construction and meshes material, durable and simple Easy to assemble with no tools required Easy-slide drawers Powder-coated metal to prevent rust and scratches

【Eye-Catching Gold Desk Organizer】Beiz gold-colored desk accessories are just the thing to elevate your workspace and give it the feeling of an executive office. A touch of gold, can go a long way to elevate the look of your workspace and improve your mood, and make you more attractive
【3 in 1 Pefect Combination】Compared with the simplicity of ordinary file organizer or desk organizer, the mesh desktop file organizer has vertical and horizontal storage space – 5 vertical sorters and 1 side load letter tray, and a 3 compartments drawer(can be used independently)
【Durable Material】 The gold desktop file organizer is made of strong mesh metal with a smooth, durable, and rust-resistant ABS coating. It has rounded edges so that picking up items won’t hurt your hands
【Easy to Install】 The gold office organizer is easy to put together, and you can do it in seconds without any tools or screws. The user manual will show you how to do it. It also has 4 soft pads on the bottom to keep the desk from getting scratched
【Considerate Customer Satisfaction】The patent number is D935,524. Beiz provides professional customer service before and after purchase. We’ll do our best to take care of your needs and questions. What you can get a high-quality gold desktop organizer and friendly customer service

Amazon Basics Metal Mesh Desk and Office Supply Organizers

Organize and Contain Supplies

Keep office supplies easily accessible and contained with Amazon Basics mesh desktop organizers for pens and pencils, sticky notes, files and more.

Steel Mesh Construction

With a modern look, the organizers and bins feature a modular steel mesh design that that can be mounted to the wall or set on a desk or tabletop.

Powder-Coated Finish

Featuring a sleek, durable powder-coated finish, the Amazon Basics mesh office line resists chipping and scratches, and stand up to daily use.

Workplace Solutions

PERFECT DESIGN: Maximize your work area. The desktop whiteboard is designed to sit perfectly between a keyboard and monitor and is slope angled for comfortable reading and writing, or typing when you are using it as a keyboard stand.
SMOOTH WRITING & EASY TO WIPE: TSJ OFFICE mini desktop computer pad comes with a smooth and durable temple glass dry erase writing surface. This white board allows you to write and wipes clean with ease over and over. Our easel whiteboard always stays white and easy to read.
HIDDEN STORAGE & PAD/MOBILE TRAY: De-clutter your desk by storing markers, magnetic eraser and other desktop accessories in the opening drawer or place markers on the accessory tray for quick access. And one more long tray on the top of the dry erase white board for your pad or mobile.
BEST GIFT IDEA: Christmas gifts for men and women. Best Gift as a tabletop whiteboard, note taking supplies, desk to do list notepad, keyboard stand, desk organizer, memo board for Your Office, Home or Classroom! Both adult and child will like this premium small white board. The clear desk pad brings them better organization, teaching and learning without paper large wasting.
100% SATISFACTION AFTER-SALES SERVICE – Your satisfaction and happiness are our top priority. Our hassle-free customer service team will work hard to resolve any issues that you have with our whiteboard. If you’re not satisfied with your order, please contact with us, we promise to return your hard-earned money.

Product Description

HUANUO Monitor Stand With Storage Organizer

Have you ever felt pain on your neck and back from looking at your computer screen too long? Have you ever complained about the limited desktop space in your workplace?

HUANUO monitor stand riser with drawer organizer provides a better way to solve these dilemmas!

SUPER DESK ORGANIZER

Designed with different drawers, our HUANUO monitor stand can store almost all the small office supplies, keeping your desk clutter-free. The upper drawer comes with 3 compartments and the lower drawer fully open. You can put small items in the upper drawer while storing documents, paper, magazines beneath.

Orgnizer
2 drawers Underneath 2 tier Underneath

Height Adjutable
X
✓
X X

Material
Mesh metal Metal Metal MDF

【Sturdy Desk Stand with Strengthened Construction】- The “H” shape construction increases the duration. This monitor stand easily hold monitors, printers up to 33lbs. Never worry about the drawer will not be easy to open
【Ergonomic Monitor Stand Riser】- Raise your monitor by 4.6″, helping you to keep a good sitting posture and prevent the possible stress on neck, back and shoulder during your long time work.
【Super Desk Organizer with 2 Drawers】- Store almost all of your small office supplies like pens, notebooks, smart phones, paper, documents etc., keeping your desk neat and tidy. A superb way to save space and decrease clutter
【Pre-assembled Computer Stand】- The monitor stand no assembly needed! Simply take the drawer out of the box , it’s already pre-assembled and ready for action
【Product Dimensions】- 15.8″ in length, 11.8″ in width and 4.6″ in height, ideal for most home and office spaces. Place it on your desk in your home or office to increase your productivity and improve your health and ready for action

From the brand

Who Are We?

SUBMATCHES was founded in 2013, Focus on household goods, research and development, design, production, sales, e-commerce operation and industrial chain system construction, provide one-stop home storage tools for people all over the world, helping people improve their living environment, improve the efficiency of living space utilization, and create a warm and comfortable home and office environment

Unique & Creative Organizer

Best-Selling Storage Bins

Best-Selling Desk Organizer

Our Mission

Delivering a sophisticated home lifestyle, enhance the happiness of home life of hundreds of millions of families.

Make Your Home More Neat, Minimalist and Comfortable

Selected the best designers in the industry to find the product design that connects life and art, selected luxury materials, set up high quality and advanced production workshops, and strictly control quality standards.

User Experience Comes First

Create more life experience of user value, continue to meet the user’s pursuit of beauty with creative and unique design, to create a sophisticated life

【STRONG SELF-ADHESIVE DRAWER】 The hidden drawer under desk can apply to various occasions such as office,kitchen, living room, bedroom, study rooms, dressing rooms. Due to the transparent plastic, it’s easy to access whatever you need at a glance. Help to organize your desk and save space. Convenient to clean it as well.
【STRONG LOAD BEARING】The desk drawer attachment is able to bear weight up to about 11lbs and withstand for years of daily use . No worry about falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can be repeatedly attached to the underside of desk and slide open/close pretty smoothly.
【LARGER CAPACITY】 The dimension of 2-layers desk drawer organizer is 9.25X7.95X6.1inch, so it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like calculators, pencils, books, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels, etc. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.
【EASY TO INSTALL】 Drill& hole- free self-adhesive under desk drawer is easy to install on smooth wall with two tapes. It perfectly protects your desk or closet from damaging. It arrives with two adhesive strips, press the adhesive tape a bit make sure the tape adheres strongly to the surface.
【SUPERIOR QUALITY】 Under desk drawer slide out is made of environmental-friendly ABS+benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant, water proof and dust-proof.BETTER USE IT AFTER 24 HOURS FOR BETTER ADHESIVE EFFECT, IF IT WAS BROKEN WHEN YOU RECEIVE OR FELL OFF AFTER APPLY IT, PLS FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US, WE WILL REFUND YOUR MONEY OR SEND NEW ONE.

Production

  • The self-adhesive storage drawer underneath desk is widely applicable in living room, office, study room, kitchen, bathroom, etc.
  • Large capacity with double layers is ideal to hold a large amount of items as you like, easy and quick to grab what you need inside. Perfect to declutter your desk and won’t take up desktop space.
  • Superior material allows you to place heavy items without falling off, durable and sturdy for years, water proof and dust-proof as well. The smooth surface will not hurt your hands.
  • It is a easy and smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

The hidden drawer pencil tray is very convenient for the underside of the table, paste them anywhere as you need to hold various items.

Bedroom

  • Our hidden self-adhesive drawer helps you organize your underwear, socks and so on.
  • It prevents dust from entering inside, much more clean and healthy to your healthy.

Study Room

  • You can easily spot whatever you want inside at a glance due to its transparency.
  • Greatly save your time to get your work completed.

Office

  • No need digging. No messy any more on your desk or closet.
  • This is a smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

Large Capacity

With two layers, and even two packs as you need, it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like not only calculators, pencils, books, staplers, notes, but also eyeglasses, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels and so on. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.

Unique Features

Load Bearing Capacity

Our product is able to bear weight up to about 10lbs and withstand for years of daily use .

No worry falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can still attach and slide in and out pretty smoothly without issues.

  • [Free Drills] Attached securely and easily! No need to drill holes into the desk with no-tracing pasting.
  • [Easy Installation] Just peel the top paper off and attach. Make sure the surface you’re attaching it to is flat and clean, and the space under desk is spacious enough to hold it.
  • [ high quality] Made of ABS+ benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant and water proof and dust-proof.

Read more

Installation Step

Step One

(Before installation, wipe the wet, oil, dirt, wax and other items on the desktop before sticking it)

Peel off the surface layer of the tape

Step Two

Paste double sided tapes on the back and press hard on it.

Step Three

Peel off the surface layer of each tape

Step Four

Paste the back side of the tape to the smooth bottom of the desk. Press up a little bit. Better use it after 24 hours for better effect.

Read more
